author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO HAS A SECOND LIFE AS A TROPICAL STORM...
summary: ...MARIO HAS A SECOND LIFE AS A TROPICAL STORM... As of 8:00 AM MST Sun Sep 14 the center of Mario was located near 18.5, -110.2 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO HAS A SECOND LIFE AS A TROPICAL STORM... As of 8:00 AM MST Sun Sep 14 the center of Mario was located near 18.5, -110.2 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
